### Electricity Generation Structure at position(8.5, 10.5)

- Offshore Pump at position(0.5, 30.5)

### Research Facility (Lab)
Consists of the following entity:

### Electricity Distribution Group
Consists of the following entity details:
- ElectricityGroup with id=1323 having poles at positions (12.5, 9.5), (10.5, 8.5), and (12.5, 10.5)

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────
• Explicit PipeGroup Matching Failures
  - When searching for a water-carrying PipeGroup using explicit string matching, ensure that a valid PipeGroup exists for the given fluid_system before issuing the search command. This error has recurred for multiple fluid_system values (4632, 4724, 4818, 4910, 5004, 5096, 5190, 5282, 5376, 5468, 5562, 5654). Validate the network configuration or update the filtering criteria to match available PipeGroups.
